Jam Pintar Meledak di Tangan Saat Tidur, Korban Luka Bakar
05 Nov 2019, 12:16 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Luka bakar akibat jam pintar meledak (Facebook)

Jakarta - Seorang pria membagikan kisahnya di akun Facebook miliknya ketika ia mengklaim jam tangan pintarnya terbakar dan berasap di tengah malam saat tengah tertidur.Hal ini pun disebut membuat pria Amerika bernama Ethan Landers mengalami luka bakar tingkat tiga. Ia pun membagikan foto tangannya yang melepuh.


Kondisi tangan usai penanganan medis (Facebook)

"Aku dengan cepat sadar Fitbit milikku terbakar, jadi aku mencoba secepat mungkin untuk mematikannya," tulisnya di Facebook, sebagaimana dikutip dari The Sun.Ia merasa mengalami rasa sakit yang intens dan mulai meninggalkan luka yang timbul."Aku merasa benda ini meleleh di tanganku. Ada asap yang keluar dari baterai FitBit dan tempat tidur kami tercium seperti api dari percikan elektrik.Namun, dalam sebuah pernyataan, Fitbit mengkonfirmasi sedang menyelidiki klaim Ethan.


Jam Fitbit yang terbakar (Facebook)

"Kesehatan dan keselamatan pelanggan kami adalah prioritas utama kami, dan kami menanggapi laporan Tuan Landers dengan sangat serius," kata seorang juru bicara kepada The Sun."Kami telah berbicara dengan Tuan Landers dan secara aktif menyelidiki masalah ini. Produk Fitbit dirancang dan diproduksi sesuai dengan standar yang ketat dan menjalani pengujian internal dan eksternal yang luas untuk memastikan keamanan pengguna kami," sambungnya.Simak Video "Kapal KN Sembilang Terbakar, Sejumlah Orang Terluka"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ask/ask)

Smart Watch Explodes in Hands While Sleeping, Burn Victims
05 Nov 2019, 12:16 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Burns due to smart watch exploding (Facebook)

Jakarta - A man shared his story on his Facebook account when he claimed his smart watch was burning and smoky in the middle of the night while he was sleeping. He also shared a blister photo of his hand.


Hand condition after medical treatment (Facebook)

"I quickly realized my Fitbit was burning, so I tried as fast as possible to turn it off," he wrote on Facebook, as quoted by The Sun. He felt experienced intense pain and began to leave scars that arise. "I felt this thing melt in my hand. There was smoke coming from the FitBit battery and our bed smelled like fire from an electric spark. However, in a statement, Fitbit confirmed it was investigating Ethan's claim.


Burning Fitbit Clock (Facebook)

"The health and safety of our customers is our top priority, and we take Mr. Landers' report very seriously," a spokesman for The Sun said. "We have spoken with Mr. Landers and are actively investigating this matter. Fitbit products are designed and manufactured according with strict standards and undergo extensive internal and external testing to ensure the safety of our users, "he continued.
